channel.title: CVE Feed for Trend Micro, Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Trend Micro, Inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-32535|2024-10-21T21:12:01.712Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20central
item.description:
Certain dashboard widgets on Trend Micro Apex Central (on-premise) are vulnerable to cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks that may allow an attacker to achieve remote code execution on affected servers.
This is similar to, but not identical to CVE-2023-32531 through 32534.

item.title: CVE-2023-32532|2024-10-21T21:12:23.691Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20central
item.description:
Certain dashboard widgets on Trend Micro Apex Central (on-premise) are vulnerable to cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks that may allow an attacker to achieve remote code execution on affected servers.
This is similar to, but not identical to CVE-2023-32531 through 32535.

item.title: CVE-2023-32533|2024-10-21T21:12:14.351Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20central
item.description:

item.title: CVE-2023-32531|2024-10-21T21:12:30.477Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20central
item.description:
Certain dashboard widgets on Trend Micro Apex Central (on-premise) are vulnerable to cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks that may allow an attacker to achieve remote code execution on affected servers.
This is similar to, but not identical to CVE-2023-32532 through 32535.

item.title: CVE-2023-32604|2024-10-21T21:11:38.297Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20central
item.description:
Affected versions Trend Micro Apex Central (on-premise) are vulnerable to potential authenticated reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks due to user input validation and sanitization issues.
Please note: an attacker must first obtain authentication to Apex Central on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
This is similar to, but not identical to CVE-2023-32605.

item.title: CVE-2023-32536|2024-10-21T21:11:51.501Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20central
item.description:
Affected versions Trend Micro Apex Central (on-premise) are vulnerable to potential authenticated reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks due to user input validation and sanitization issues.
Please note: an attacker must first obtain authentication to Apex Central on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
This is similar to, but not identical to CVE-2023-32537.

item.title: CVE-2023-32534|2024-10-21T21:12:08.711Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20central
item.description:
Certain dashboard widgets on Trend Micro Apex Central (on-premise) are vulnerable to cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks that may allow an attacker to achieve remote code execution on affected servers.
This is similar to, but not identical to CVE-2023-32531 through 32535.

item.title: CVE-2023-32537|2024-10-21T21:11:44.863Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20central
item.description:
Affected versions Trend Micro Apex Central (on-premise) are vulnerable to potential authenticated reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks due to user input validation and sanitization issues.
Please note: an attacker must first obtain authentication to Apex Central on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
This is similar to, but not identical to CVE-2023-32536.

item.title: CVE-2024-36359|2024-08-02T03:37:04.786Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20interscan%20web%20security%20virtual%20appliance
item.description:
A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Trend Micro InterScan Web Security Virtual Appliance (IWSVA) 6.5 could allow an attacker to escalate privileges on affected installations.
Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-36473|2024-08-02T03:37:05.369Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20vpn%20proxy%20one%20pro
item.description: Trend Micro VPN Proxy One Pro, version 5.8.1012 and below is vulnerable to an arbitrary file overwrite or create attack but is limited to local Denial of Service (DoS) and under specific conditions can lead to elevation of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-36307|2024-08-02T03:37:04.691Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description:
A security agent link following vulnerability in Trend Micro Apex One and Apex One as a Service could allow a local attacker to disclose sensitive information about the agent on affected installations.
Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-36306|2024-08-02T03:37:04.320Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description:
A link following vulnerability in the Trend Micro Apex One and Apex One as a Service Damage Cleanup Engine could allow a local attacker to create a denial-of-service condition on affected installations.
Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-36304|2024-08-02T03:37:04.674Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description:
A Time-of-Check Time-Of-Use vulnerability in the Trend Micro Apex One and Apex One as a Service agent could allow a local attacker to escalate privileges on affected installations.
Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-36305|2024-08-02T03:37:04.992Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one

item.title: CVE-2024-36302|2024-08-02T03:37:05.069Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description:
An origin validation vulnerability in the Trend Micro Apex One security agent could allow a local attacker to escalate privileges on affected installations.
Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
This vulnerability is similar to, but not identical to, CVE-2024-36303.

item.title: CVE-2024-36358|2024-08-02T03:37:05.280Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20deep%20security%20agent
item.description:

Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.

item.description:

Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.

item.description: Trend Micro Security 17.x (Consumer) is vulnerable to a Privilege Escalation vulnerability that could allow a local attacker to unintentionally delete privileged Trend Micro files including its own.
